item.title: Supporting Android Q gestural navigation
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: From Android Q onwards devices can now operate in a fully gestural system navigation mode. In that mode, there is no longer an on-screen back button, instead users can swipe from both edges to navigate back.
